description.plain:
LANY is a three-piece dreampop band from Los Angeles consisting of Paul Klein, Jake Goss and Les Priest. The group formed in March 2014. Their name stands for “Los Angeles New York.”

When Klein met the other members in Nashville and LANY was born, Goss and Priest abandoned their previous project called WRLDS. A month later, the trio took to Soundcloud and uploaded two tracks anonymously. Acronyms was their 3-track debut EP, which increased their fan base and online traffic, especially due to their hit song “ILYSB.” After they dropped two more singles, they revealed their identities.

LANY signed to Polydor Records in 2015 after they released the I Loved You. EP in June. They toured across the United States in support of acts such as Halsey and X Ambassadors. Make Out EP came out in December of the same year.

2016 began with the release of “WHERE THE HELL ARE MY FRIENDS” and its accompanying music video and was quickly followed by a 6-track EP entitled kinda, released in the summer of 2016. They toured the U.S. in support of Oh Wonder before embarking on their first headline tour in the fall.

In early 2017, LANY announced their self-titled debut album, released June 30, and premiered the album’s first promotional single “Good Girls.” They then began their second headline tour in Europe and Australia and supported John Mayer before returning to headline a tour in the U.S.

body.plain:
LANY is a three-piece dreampop band from Los Angeles consisting of Paul Klein, Jake Goss and Les Priest. The group formed in March 2014. Their name stands for “Los Angeles New York.”

When Klein met the other members in Nashville and LANY was born, Goss and Priest abandoned their previous project called WRLDS. A month later, the trio took to Soundcloud and uploaded two tracks anonymously. Acronyms was their 3-track debut EP, which increased their fan base and online traffic, especially due to their hit song “ILYSB.” After they dropped two more singles, they revealed their identities.

LANY signed to Polydor Records in 2015 after they released the I Loved You. EP in June. They toured across the United States in support of acts such as Halsey and X Ambassadors. Make Out EP came out in December of the same year.

2016 began with the release of “WHERE THE HELL ARE MY FRIENDS” and its accompanying music video and was quickly followed by a 6-track EP entitled kinda, released in the summer of 2016. They toured the U.S. in support of Oh Wonder before embarking on their first headline tour in the fall.

In early 2017, LANY announced their self-titled debut album, released June 30, and premiered the album’s first promotional single “Good Girls.” They then began their second headline tour in Europe and Australia and supported John Mayer before returning to headline a tour in the U.S.

songs.title: Super Far

description.plain:
“Super Far” is about a long distance relationship that’s coming to an end.

When asked about his favorite tracks in an interview with Ambient Light, frontman Paul Klein stated:

I have two, ‘13’, and ‘Super Far’. ‘Super Far’ I think is going to be really massive, I think it has a wide appeal similar to ‘ILYSB’."

The track was released as a single on June 28, 2017.

songs.embed_content: Read “Super Far” by LANY on Genius

When asked about his favorite tracks in an interview with Ambient Light, frontman Paul Klein stated:

songs.full_title: Super Far - Spotify Studios NYC by LANY
songs.title: Super Far - Spotify Studios NYC

songs.lyrics:
33 ContributorsSuper Far Lyrics[Verse 1]
Up all night on my mind got me thinking
Wanna stay, can you give me a reason?
I don't think so, I don't think so
I'm in love with someone, but I'm not sure
She can love someone back the way they love her
I don't think so, I don't think so

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Don't be mean, if you wanna go
You can leave and leave my heart alone

[Chorus]
Waking up to nothing when you're super far from home
And I watch you fall asleep at night and lay there on my own
Got me begging for affection, all you do is roll your eyes
Broken down, I've had enough
If this is love, I don't want it

[Verse 2]
Give it time, c'mon babe, it's been ten months
You should know, do you know, know what you want?
I don't think so, I don't think so
Make it work, know it hurts, but I'll go there
Do the same, can you show me that you care?
God, I hope so, but I don't think so
You might also like[Pre-Chorus 2]
Don't be mean, if you're here for good
I'm gonna need a little more from you

[Chorus]
Waking up to nothing when you're super far from home
And I watch you fall asleep at night and lay there on my own
Got me begging for affection, all you do is roll your eyes
Broken down, I've had enough
If this is love, I don't want it
All my friends keep saying that I'm way too good to you
But my heart is so invested, I don't wanna face the truth
I'm not happy, and you know it, and you still don't even try
Broken down, I've had enough
If this is love, I don't want it

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
Waking up to nothing when you're super far from home
And I watch you fall asleep at night and lay there on my own
Got me begging for affection, all you do is roll your eyes
Broken down, I've had enough
If this is love, I don't want it
All my friends keep saying that I'm way too good to you
But my heart is so invested, I don't wanna face the truth
I'm not happy, and you know it, and you still don't even try
Broken down, I've had enough
If this is love, I don't want it19Embed

description.plain:
‘'13’‘ is the eighth track of LANY’s eponymous album, and the last single to be released in anticipation of the album. This song was a long time in the making: Klein came up with the song’s bouncy guitar riff when he was just 18. In its ten-year development, the song shaped up to include Jake Goss’ signature beats.

On Twitter LANY stated:

https://twitter.com/thisisLANY/status/870500176837857280

songs.embed_content: Read “13” by LANY on Genius

songs.title: Malibu Nights

description.plain:
“Malibu Nights” serves as the title track for Malibu Nights, as well as the closure. The song is about someone’s thoughts after a breakup.

“Malibu Nights” was teased through the release of the album trailer published on 6 September 2018.

songs.embed_content: Read “Malibu Nights” by LANY on Genius

body.plain:
“Malibu Nights” serves as the title track for Malibu Nights, as well as the closure. The song is about someone’s thoughts after a breakup.

“Malibu Nights” was teased through the release of the album trailer published on 6 September 2018.

songs.full_title: Malibu Nights by Marina Lin (Ft. Sahara)
songs.title: Malibu Nights

songs.lyrics:
51 ContributorsMalibu Nights Lyrics[Verse 1]
There's no reason, there's no rhyme
I found myself blindsided by
A feeling that I've never known
I'm dealing with it on my own
Phone is quiet, walls are bare
I drink myself to sleep, who cares?
No one even has to know
I'm dealing with it on my own

[Chorus]
I've got way too much time to be this hurt
Somebody help, it's getting worse
What do you do with a broken heart?
Once the light fades, everything is dark
Way too much whiskey in my blood
I feel my body giving up
Can I hold on for another night?
What do I do with all this time?

[Verse 2]
Heavy thoughts when it gets late
Put me in a fragile state
I wish I wasn't going home
Dealing with it on my own
I'm praying but it's not enough
I'm done, I don't believe in love
Learning how to let it go
Dealing with it on my own
You might also like[Chorus]
I've got way too much time to be this hurt
Somebody help, it's getting worse
What do you do with a broken heart?
Once the light fades, everything is dark
Way too much whiskey in my blood
I feel my body giving up
Can I hold on for another night?
What do I do with all this time? Yeah

[Refrain]
I drive circles under street lights
Nothing seems to clear my mind
I can't forget
Get this out my head, so
I drive, chasing Malibu nights
Nothing seems to heal my mind
I can't forget

[Chorus]
I've got way too much time to be this hurt
Somebody help, it's getting worse
What do you do with a broken heart?
Once the light fades, everything is dark

I feel my body giving up

[Refrain]

Nothing seems to clear my mind
I can't forget
Get this out my head, so
I drive, chasing Malibu nights
Nothing seems to heal my mind
I can't forget
(Get this out my head, so)
I drive, chasing Malibu nights
Hey, yeah, na-na, ah yeah38Embed
